    <item>
      <title>Jo Cox's sister: 'Difficult day' amid harassment claims</title>
      <link>http://news.sky.com/story/jo-coxs-sister-we-will-support-widower-brendan-amid-harassment-claims-11256188</link>
      <description>The sister of murdered MP Jo Cox has said the family will support her widower over accusations of sexual harassment.</description>
      <pubDate>Sun, 18 Feb 2018 11:13:00 +0000</pubDate>
      <guid>http://news.sky.com/story/jo-coxs-sister-we-will-support-widower-brendan-amid-harassment-claims-11256188</guid>
      <enclosure url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/skynews-brendan-cox-jo-cox_4234291.jpg?20180218114035" length="0" type="image/jpeg"/>
      <media:description type="html">Brendan Cox, widower of MP Jo Cox</media:description>
      <media:thumbnail url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/skynews-brendan-cox-jo-cox_4234291.jpg?20180218114035" width="70" height="70"/>
      <media:content type="image/jpeg" url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/skynews-brendan-cox-jo-cox_4234291.jpg?20180218114035"/>
    </item>
    <item>
      <title>'All aspects' of university funding to be looked at</title>
      <link>http://news.sky.com/story/all-aspects-of-university-funding-to-be-looked-at-in-higher-education-review-11256302</link>
      <description>A long-awaited review into higher education funding will look at "all aspects" of the system, the universities minister has told Sky News.</description>
      <pubDate>Sun, 18 Feb 2018 12:40:00 +0000</pubDate>
      <guid>http://news.sky.com/story/all-aspects-of-university-funding-to-be-looked-at-in-higher-education-review-11256302</guid>
      <enclosure url="http://e3.365dm.com/17/12/70x70/skynews-universities-education_4178986.jpg?20171210111504" length="0" type="image/jpeg"/>
      <media:description type="html">University students will be offered &#34;accelerated&#34; two-year degrees costing up to £11,100 a year under Government plans.</media:description>
      <media:thumbnail url="http://e3.365dm.com/17/12/70x70/skynews-universities-education_4178986.jpg?20171210111504" width="70" height="70"/>
      <media:content type="image/jpeg" url="http://e3.365dm.com/17/12/70x70/skynews-universities-education_4178986.jpg?20171210111504"/>
    </item>
    <item>
      <title>Waste of time to run again, ousted UKIP leader told</title>
      <link>http://news.sky.com/story/dont-waste-your-time-running-again-ousted-ukip-leader-henry-bolton-told-11256516</link>
      <description>UKIP's interim leader has told his ousted predecessor not to "waste his time" by running for the job again, as the party prepares itself for yet another leadership contest.</description>
      <pubDate>Sun, 18 Feb 2018 14:31:00 +0000</pubDate>
      <guid>http://news.sky.com/story/dont-waste-your-time-running-again-ousted-ukip-leader-henry-bolton-told-11256516</guid>
      <enclosure url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/01/70x70/skynews-ukip-poster-ukip_4211807.jpg?20180122105406" length="0" type="image/jpeg"/>
      <media:description type="html">UKIP poster</media:description>
      <media:thumbnail url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/01/70x70/skynews-ukip-poster-ukip_4211807.jpg?20180122105406" width="70" height="70"/>
      <media:content type="image/jpeg" url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/01/70x70/skynews-ukip-poster-ukip_4211807.jpg?20180122105406"/>
    </item>
    <item>
      <title>Whither, ousted UKIP leader Henry Bolton?</title>
      <link>http://news.sky.com/story/whither-ousted-ukip-leader-henry-bolton-11255778</link>
      <description>Henry Bolton became leader 142 days ago. And for 142 days in the sun, he has lost, more or less everything.</description>
      <pubDate>Sat, 17 Feb 2018 22:34:00 +0000</pubDate>
      <guid>http://news.sky.com/story/whither-ousted-ukip-leader-henry-bolton-11255778</guid>
      <enclosure url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/01/70x70/skynews-henry-bolton-ukip_4211984.jpg?20180122145600" length="0" type="image/jpeg"/>
      <media:description type="html">TORQUAY, ENGLAND - SEPTEMBER 30: Newly elected UKIP leader Henry Bolton walks on the beach following morning TV interviews at their autumn conference on September 30, 2017 in Torquay, England. Bolton is the UKIP party&#39;s fourth leader in just over a year. (Photo by Matt Cardy/Getty Images)
</media:description>
      <media:thumbnail url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/01/70x70/skynews-henry-bolton-ukip_4211984.jpg?20180122145600" width="70" height="70"/>
      <media:content type="image/jpeg" url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/01/70x70/skynews-henry-bolton-ukip_4211984.jpg?20180122145600"/>
    </item>
    <item>
      <title>World Vision denies staff exploited Haiti victims</title>
      <link>http://news.sky.com/story/world-vision-denies-staff-sexually-exploited-haiti-earthquake-survivors-11255846</link>
      <description>Government-funded charity World Vision has denied allegations its staff sexually exploited Haiti earthquake survivors.</description>
      <pubDate>Sun, 18 Feb 2018 04:08:00 +0000</pubDate>
      <guid>http://news.sky.com/story/world-vision-denies-staff-sexually-exploited-haiti-earthquake-survivors-11255846</guid>
      <enclosure url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/2371802180109680207_4234063.jpg?20180218040250" length="0" type="image/jpeg"/>
      <media:description type="html">World Vision staff are accused of sexually exploiting Haiti survivors</media:description>
      <media:thumbnail url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/2371802180109680207_4234063.jpg?20180218040250" width="70" height="70"/>
      <media:content type="image/jpeg" url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/2371802180109680207_4234063.jpg?20180218040250"/>
    </item>
    <item>
      <title>May to EU: 'Doctrine' should not risk security</title>
      <link>http://news.sky.com/story/theresa-may-blasts-eu-political-doctrine-in-push-for-post-brexit-security-deal-11254086</link>
      <description>Theresa May has called for a new security treaty with the EU after Brexit, warning against "deep-seated ideology" from Brussels scuppering a deal.</description>
      <pubDate>Sat, 17 Feb 2018 09:43:00 +0000</pubDate>
      <guid>http://news.sky.com/story/theresa-may-blasts-eu-political-doctrine-in-push-for-post-brexit-security-deal-11254086</guid>
      <enclosure url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/skynews-theresa-may-eu-security_4233377.jpg?20180217094932" length="0" type="image/jpeg"/>
      <media:description type="html">British Prime Minister Theresa May delivers a speech at the 2018 Munich Security Conference on February 17, 2018 in Munich, Germany</media:description>
      <media:thumbnail url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/skynews-theresa-may-eu-security_4233377.jpg?20180217094932" width="70" height="70"/>
      <media:content type="image/jpeg" url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/skynews-theresa-may-eu-security_4233377.jpg?20180217094932"/>
    </item>
    <item>
      <title>PM in Munich: A speech for two audiences</title>
      <link>http://news.sky.com/story/theresa-may-in-munich-a-speech-for-two-audiences-11254890</link>
      <description>Theresa May came to Munich to speak about a topic that she feels quite comfortable with and the UK feels quite powerful on - security.</description>
      <pubDate>Sat, 17 Feb 2018 15:24:00 +0000</pubDate>
      <guid>http://news.sky.com/story/theresa-may-in-munich-a-speech-for-two-audiences-11254890</guid>
      <enclosure url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/skynews-may-theresa-may-munich_4233663.jpg?20180217162515" length="0" type="image/jpeg"/>
      <media:description type="html">British Prime Minister Theresa May delivers a speech at the 2018 Munich Security Conference</media:description>
      <media:thumbnail url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/skynews-may-theresa-may-munich_4233663.jpg?20180217162515" width="70" height="70"/>
      <media:content type="image/jpeg" url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/skynews-may-theresa-may-munich_4233663.jpg?20180217162515"/>
    </item>
    <item>
      <title>Jeremy Corbyn denies Cold War spy claims</title>
      <link>http://news.sky.com/story/jeremy-corbyn-denies-claims-he-was-paid-to-spy-on-britain-during-cold-war-11253891</link>
      <description>Jeremy Corbyn has denied claims by a former Cold War spook that he was allegedly paid by Communist secret police to spy on Britain.</description>
      <pubDate>Sat, 17 Feb 2018 01:08:00 +0000</pubDate>
      <guid>http://news.sky.com/story/jeremy-corbyn-denies-claims-he-was-paid-to-spy-on-britain-during-cold-war-11253891</guid>
      <enclosure url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/2371802170109230007_4233274.jpg?20180217021201" length="0" type="image/jpeg"/>
      <media:description type="html">Jeremy Corbyn is accused of spying for Czechoslovakia</media:description>
      <media:thumbnail url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/2371802170109230007_4233274.jpg?20180217021201" width="70" height="70"/>
      <media:content type="image/jpeg" url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/2371802170109230007_4233274.jpg?20180217021201"/>
    </item>
    <item>
      <title>Merkel boosts May's hopes of bespoke Brexit deal</title>
      <link>http://news.sky.com/story/angela-merkel-boosts-theresa-mays-hopes-of-a-bespoke-brexit-deal-11253457</link>
      <description>Theresa May's hopes of securing her preferred kind of Brexit deal have been given a boost by Angela Merkel.</description>
      <pubDate>Fri, 16 Feb 2018 17:43:00 +0000</pubDate>
      <guid>http://news.sky.com/story/angela-merkel-boosts-theresa-mays-hopes-of-a-bespoke-brexit-deal-11253457</guid>
      <enclosure url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/skynews-theresa-may-angela-merkel_4233024.jpg?20180216164417" length="0" type="image/jpeg"/>
      <media:description type="html">Theresa May and Angela Merkel</media:description>
      <media:thumbnail url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/skynews-theresa-may-angela-merkel_4233024.jpg?20180216164417" width="70" height="70"/>
      <media:content type="image/jpeg" url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/skynews-theresa-may-angela-merkel_4233024.jpg?20180216164417"/>
    </item>
    <item>
      <title>Scandal-hit Oxfam to stop bidding for funding</title>
      <link>http://news.sky.com/story/oxfam-scandal-charity-to-stop-bidding-for-government-funding-11253484</link>
      <description>Oxfam has agreed to stop bidding for Government funding until ministers are satisfied it can meet the "high standards" expected.</description>
      <pubDate>Fri, 16 Feb 2018 18:10:00 +0000</pubDate>
      <guid>http://news.sky.com/story/oxfam-scandal-charity-to-stop-bidding-for-government-funding-11253484</guid>
      <enclosure url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/skynews-oxfam-bookshop_4227756.jpg?20180210174504" length="0" type="image/jpeg"/>
      <media:description type="html">The logo on the front of an Oxfam bookshop is photographed in Glasgow on February 10, 2018</media:description>
      <media:thumbnail url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/skynews-oxfam-bookshop_4227756.jpg?20180210174504" width="70" height="70"/>
      <media:content type="image/jpeg" url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/skynews-oxfam-bookshop_4227756.jpg?20180210174504"/>
    </item>
